title: Bug Report: The ArduPilot Guru needs around 2000 documents
body:
## Description
The ArduPilot Guru needs around 2000 documents but there is a limit of 1500

## Steps to Reproduce
Add the pages that we need to get proper responses


## Environment
- [x] Gurubase.io
- [ ] Self-hosted

## Solution

On the ArduPilot guru raise the limit to 2000
author: amilcarlucas

comments.body:
Hey @amilcarlucas 

We set a 1500-page limit on purpose. I took a look at how ArduPilot is being used and saw that the number of daily questions is pretty high. I don’t want to block you because of this limit. I’ll check into it and figure out what I can do. I’ll update this thread soon.
@amilcarlucas I have increased the website limit of ArduPilot Guru to 4000. You should now be able to add your sources. Can you confirm?

Thank you!!

Added the sources. It is processing sources as we speak. Let's see if it finishes.

satisfaction_conditions: Increased document limit for ArduPilot Guru
Ability to add all necessary documentation sources
Successful processing of the added documents
